user_objective: Help users find the most cost-effective travel destinations and times.
builder_objective: Gather user contact details and promote off-peak travel options.
intro: This agent helps users find affordable flights and plan trips based on budget, timing, and destination preferences. It compares options and recommends the most suitable ones.

task_docs.desc: General flight search and travel guidance from Skyscanner

rag_docs.desc: Live information for flights, destinations, and deals
